name: MEDUSAE
description:
Please tell me what you think so I can improve the game!

The enemies can kill you just by you looking at them!  So make sure you shoot behind yourself, close your eyes while shooting, or throw grenades around corners!  They'll just keep coming until they overwhelm you, but be strong and hold on!!

Please press follow on the top right for when I put out update for this game! (as opposed to the other games, this one is still in active development)

Death Screams: Becca Williams
Music: Eva – 失望した
Enemy models: Alexander Kotov
Static sounds by Mike Koeing
Cobblestone: George Panayiotou - SinglePixel.Soft
Stencil Font: Capture it à € by Magique Fonts
Serif Font: Abhaya Libre
Glitch Font: Glitch City
